snippet: The Pentagon argues that if the government does not oppose any court-ordered release of Tariq Ba Odah, other detainees may go on hunger strikes.
abstract: Obama administration opposes release of Guantanamo Bay inmate Tariq Ba Odah, who has been on hunger strike since Feb 2007, but is reportedly working on finding transfer deals.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon argues that if the government does not oppose any court-ordered release of Tariq Ba Odah, other detainees may go on hunger strikes.

headline.main: U.S. Is Poised to Oppose Freeing Guantánamo Hunger Striker
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Poised to Oppose Freeing Guantánamo Inmate
